name: Cactus Aviation, LLC
about: Cactus Aviation, LLC, located in the Executive Terminal of Henderson Executive Airport in Southern Nevada, is a premier flight training institution and the region's exclusive Cessna® Pilot Center. Since 2008, we have been dedicated to providing safe, professional, and cost-effective flight training. Our prime location offers students the unique opportunity to train amidst stunning landmarks such as the Las Vegas Strip, Hoover Dam, Lake Mead, and the Grand Canyon. With a growing fleet of Cessna® 172s and a Redbird LD Simulator, we ensure comprehensive training. We are a Pt. 61 flight school and a PSI testing center, and we pride ourselves on creating a family-friendly community. Our team of experienced flight instructors is committed to guiding students from their initial Discovery Flight to achieving milestones like their Private Pilot License and beyond. We are honored to be a recipient of the 2024 Top Hawk program, reflecting our commitment to excellence in aviation training.
